name: The Holy Radiant Maze - Hololive ID Fan Game
name_original: The Holy Radiant Maze - Hololive ID Fan Game
description:
Wait, is this the Holoserver?

Finding themselves trapped within a world that is both alien and yet awfully familiar at the same time, the members of Hololive Indonesia's 1st and 2nd generation has one goal in mind; 

Find the way to get the hell back!

However, the only lead they have is the gargantuan maze that stands in front of them. And since getting lost is their forte, this might take a while...

And as they venture deeper, they discover that they might not be the only ones trapped within this strange world... 

We're idols! Not comme-I mean, warriors!! ...Sorry, force of habit.

It goes without saying that fighting monsters are not really in the list of an idol's routine training. But don't worry! Because HoloID is built different!

Fight! Exploit enemy's weakness! Win! Loot! Sell said loots to buy HoloIDrinks! Drink said HoloIDrinks to get stronger! Fight! Repeat!

That might sound barbaric, but rest assured, they are 100% idols, guys!
